entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 32 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
